price: 42. En (weet) dat de engelen zeiden: “O, Maryam! Waarlijk, Allah heeft jou uitgekozen, jou gereinigd en heeft jou boven alle vrouwen van de wereldwezens uitverkoren.
arabic: وَإِذۡ قَالَتِ ٱلۡمَلَٰٓئِكَةُ يَٰمَرۡيَمُ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ ٱصۡطَفَىٰكِ وَطَهَّرَكِ وَٱصۡطَفَىٰكِ عَلَىٰ نِسَآءِ ٱلۡعَٰلَمِينَ

version.title: Dutch translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Dutch language, for the Dutch Islamic Center - in progress.

meta.transliteration: wa-idh qālati al-malāikatu yāmaryamu inna al-laha iṣ'ṭafāki waṭahharaki wa-iṣ'ṭafāki ʿalā nisāi al-ʿālamīna
